title: About us
hero-text: The Albanian-German Lawyers' Association (Albanisch-Deutsche Juristenverein e.V.), based in Frankfurt am Main, was founded to promote legal cooperation between Albania and Germany and to represent the interests of Albanian and German lawyers in both countries.
bottom-hero-text: Become part of our network and help shape the future of Albanian-German legal cooperation!
title1: Bridge between Albanian and German law
content1: Our goal is to strengthen cooperation between Albanian and German lawyers, to promote understanding of the legal systems of both countries and to create a space for further legal training and networking. We regularly offer our members events, seminars, conferences and workshops on various legal topics, both from a national and international perspective.
content2: The Albanian-German Lawyers' Association is committed to dialogue and mutual support between the legal community in both countries. We work closely with German and Albanian institutions to deepen legal relations and improve the legal framework for cooperation between the two countries.
